ONE

Top Ten Reasons Why the Holidays Suck

[I]94-lass ’m fat . As much as [I]94-lass hate to admit it , the point was driven [home]321-home with brutal clarity by [Granny Gums]42-granny gums when [she]42-granny gums saw [me]94-lass at Thanksgiving and said with a cackle , “ Looks like [somebody]1704-somebody already ate the turkey ! ”[42-granny gums] [I]94-lass ’d blame it on [her]42-granny gums dementia , but the photos [Mom]43-mom sent [me]94-lass this morning offer irrefutable proof that sometime over the past few years , [I]94-lass have acquired an alarming similarity to a barnyard animal .

Snow . [Manhattan]455-manhattan snow is never white . It ’s a drab , listless brown , like [my]94-lass hair . ( Note to self : call the hairdresser . Red ? ? ? )

Christmas movies . Why is [Home Alone]322-home alone considered a good holiday family movie ? [Kevin McCallister]44-kevin mccallister and [[his]44-kevin mccallister siblings]323-his siblings should be adopted by [concerned relatives]324-concerned relatives . And It ’s a Wonderful Life ? [I]94-lass ’m sorry , but [someone]325-someone has to say it : [George Bailey]45-george bailey is a dick . There are so many examples of [his]45-george bailey dickery during that movie , it ’s another list altogether . One of [my]94-lass favorites quotes : “ [You]326-you call this [a happy family]1705-a happy family ? Why do [we]1706-we have to have [all these kids]1707-all these kids ? ”[94-lass] [I]94-lass can feel the love , [Superdad]46-superdad .

Christmas shopping . Also known as Standing in Line until [You]326-you Die , Christmas shopping includes three of [my]94-lass all - time favorite things : [screaming children]327-screaming children , [angry soccer moms]328-angry soccer moms , and [me]94-lass aimlessly wandering around a crowded public space until [I]94-lass ’m drenched in sweat . December in [a mall]329-a mall is like The Hunger Games meets [Lord of [the Flies]331-the flies]330-lord of the flies , completed with a reenactment of Death Race in [the parking lot]332-the parking lot when [you]333-you finally try to leave after twelve hours of spending money [you]333-you do n’t have . Fun times .

Office Christmas parties . Oh , great ! Awkward , forced conversations with coworkers [I]94-lass want to unfriend on Facebook !

Christmas music . It is awful and depressing . As a perfect example , [I]94-lass offer the lyrics to “ Do [They]1708-they Know It ’s Christmas ? ”[94-lass] by [Band Aid]47-band aid : “ There ’s a world outside [your]333-you window / And it ’s a world of dread and fear / Where the only water flowing is the bitter sting of tears / And the Christmas bells that ring there / Are the clanging chimes of doom . ”[94-lass] Please excuse [me]94-lass while [I]94-lass go jump off a ledge .

[Santa]48-santa is a lie .

Kiss at midnight on [New Year ’s Eve]2-new year ’s eve ? The chances of being flattened by a stray asteroid are better .

[Michael]370-michael still does n’t love [me]94-lass .

See number nine .

“ [Jocelyn]50-jocelyn ! ”[370-michael]

[I]94-lass jerk , startled from [my]94-lass list making by the sound of a voice . It ’s [Portia]340-portia — blade - thin , elegant , blonde editorial director [Portia]340-portia — looming over [my]94-lass desk , smiling in that way [she]340-portia does that makes [me]94-lass self - conscious and uncomfortable , attacked by [her]340-portia physical perfection and how hideous [I]94-lass feel in comparison .

[The woman]340-portia looks airbrushed . [I]94-lass have back fat , pores [a toddler]334-a toddler could fall into , and cat hair on [my]94-lass sweater . Normally [I]94-lass would n’t let [her]340-portia get this close , but [the witch]335-the witch snuck up on [me]94-lass .

“ Hi , [Portia]340-portia . ”[94-lass] [I]94-lass peer up at [her]340-portia and nervously adjust [my]94-lass glasses , too weirded out by how [she]340-portia can materialize from thin air like [Dracula]52-dracula to be annoyed that ’s [she]340-portia ’s called [me]94-lass by the wrong name . Again .

“ Would [you]1709-you mind taking a look at this manuscript ? [Maria]53-maria called in sick , and [we]1710-we ’re behind deadline . ”[340-portia] Without waiting for a response , [she]340-portia drops a thick rubber - banded sheaf of papers on [my]94-lass desk , right on top of the Holidays Suck list [I]94-lass was making on a yellow legal pad . “ [We]1710-we need it by Monday . ”[94-lass]

“ Monday ? ”[94-lass] [I]94-lass stare in horror at the enormous pile of papers .

“ Thanks ! [You]1709-you ’re [a doll]1711-a doll ! ”[340-portia] [Portia]340-portia turns to leave .

[I]94-lass stand abruptly , knocking over [my]94-lass chair in the process . Because of course [I]94-lass would . It clatters to the floor and makes heads turn in [my]94-lass direction . [I]94-lass sit in the middle of a warren of cubicles on the thirty - third floor of [Maddox Publishing]4-maddox publishing , where [I]94-lass ’ve worked for the past ten years . It ’s four o’clock on a Friday afternoon , and [I]94-lass ’m about to make [a fool of [myself]94-lass]336-a fool of myself .

So it ’s situation normal in [the world of [Joellen Bixby]126-joellen]337-the world of joellen bixby .

[I]94-lass blurt , “ Wait ! ”[94-lass]

[Portia]340-portia stops . [She]340-portia turns slowly , pivoting in a pair of red - soled heels that likely cost more than [I]94-lass make in a paycheck , then props a hand on one bony hip and stares at [me]94-lass with arched brows .

Conscious of the sudden quiet and the field of [my]94-lass coworkers ’ staring eyeballs , [I]94-lass clear [my]94-lass throat . “ Um . [I]94-lass , uh , do n’t think [I]94-lass can finish it by Monday . ”[94-lass]

The field of eyeballs eagerly shifts to [Portia]340-portia , who is gazing at [me]94-lass with all the warmth of an iceberg . “ [You]340-portia do n’t think ? ”[340-portia]

[She]340-portia makes it sound as if [my]94-lass cognitive ability is in question . [Someone in a cubicle nearby]338-someone in a cubicle nearby coughs into [his]338-someone in a cubicle nearby hand to hide a laugh .

“ [I]340-portia . . . [I]340-portia mean , [I]340-portia ’m already so busy with all [my]340-portia other projects , and this one looks like it ’s fairly substantial . . . [I]340-portia ’d have to work all weekend . ”[340-portia]

[Portia]340-portia sends [me]94-lass a narrow - eyed look that could wither crops . “ So [you]340-portia ’re saying [you]340-portia ’re incapable of handling [your]340-portia workload . Is that correct ? ”[340-portia]

Whispers begin to rise all around [me]94-lass . A trickle of cold sweat snakes down between [my]94-lass shoulder blades , and [my]94-lass cheeks flame with heat . “ No , [I]94-lass . . . [I]94-lass ’m sure [I]94-lass can work it in . Monday it is . ”[94-lass]

“ First thing in the morning , ”[340-portia] says [Portia]340-portia , in the same tone [someone pointing a gun at a cashier]339-someone pointing a gun at a cashier would say , “ Give [me]340-portia the money . ”[340-portia]

[I]94-lass swallow . [Gulp]54-gulp , actually , like a goldfish . Then [I]94-lass nod , but [Portia]340-portia does n’t see it because [she]340-portia ’s already turned around and left .

[I]94-lass duck down , avoiding all the smirks and stares aimed in [my]94-lass direction , right [my]94-lass chair , then sit hunched over [my]94-lass desk in misery like [Quasimodo]55-quasimodo . [I]94-lass stay that way for several minutes , silently ordering [my]94-lass hands to stop shaking and [my]94-lass stomach to settle while [I]94-lass gaze at the calendar pinned to the gray felt wall of [my]94-lass cubicle . It features twelve months of [Grumpy Cat]56-grumpy cat . December shows the cat in a Santa outfit , complete with a little red hat and black boots .

It ’s a present from [[my]94-lass mother]340-portia . [I]94-lass must ’ve done some truly awful things in a previous life .

“ Why did n’t [you]58-sue wong just say no , [Joellen]126-joellen ? ”[58-sue wong]

[Sue Wong]58-sue wong , recent college grad and [youngest person]341-youngest person to be promoted to the position of acquisitions editor in [Maddox Publishing]4-maddox publishing ’s eighty - year history , stands at the entrance of [my]94-lass cubicle . [Sue]58-sue wong has shiny black hair that falls to [her]58-sue wong shoulders , a fringe of bangs so precise it looks like it was sliced with an X - ACTO blade , and an adorable pair of dimples that make [her]58-sue wong look years younger than [her]58-sue wong actual age of twenty - three .

[I]94-lass am insanely jealous of those dimples . And of how [she]58-sue wong can consume approximately five thousand calories per day and never gain an ounce . And of how [she]58-sue wong is not terrified one bit of [Portia]340-portia , [Dragon Queen of [the Upper East Side]6-the upper east side]342-dragon queen of the upper east side , or of anything else as far as [I]94-lass can tell .

“ Because [I]58-sue wong ’ll get fired if [I]58-sue wong say no ! [I]58-sue wong have these little things called bills ? [Rent]60-rent ? [You]1712-you ’ve heard of [them]60-rent ? ”[58-sue wong]

[Sue]58-sue wong finds [my]94-lass logic faulty and waves a hand dismissively in the air . “ Pfft . [They]60-rent ’ll never fire [you]1712-you . [You]1712-you ’re [a workhorse]1713-a workhorse . ”[58-sue wong]

For an unpleasant moment , [I]94-lass imagine [myself]94-lass as a Clydesdale with steam billowing from [my]94-lass nostrils , clumps of dirt flying behind [my]94-lass thick fetlocks as [I]94-lass pull a Budweiser hitch through [Central Park]7-central park .

“ And [you]1712-you ’ve been here forever , ”[58-sue wong] [Sue]58-sue wong continues . “ Besides , [you]1712-you ’re in a protected class . [Portia]340-portia would n’t want to risk a lawsuit . ”[58-sue wong]

[Genuinely]61-genuinely confused , [I]94-lass stare at [her]58-sue wong . “ What protected class is that ? ”[61-genuinely]

“ Age , ”[58-sue wong] [she]58-sue wong says , as if it ’s obvious .

“ Age ? ”[94-lass]

“ Yeah . [You]1712-you ’re , like , totally old . ”[94-lass]

“ [I]94-lass ’m thirty - six ! ”[94-lass]

“ Oh . Really ? ”[58-sue wong] [She]58-sue wong looks [me]94-lass up and down . “ Huh . ”[58-sue wong]

[I]94-lass say drily , “ Thanks . Are [we]1714-we done with the pep talk ? Because [I]94-lass ’ve got a ton of work to do . ”[94-lass]

“ [I]94-lass just wanted to see if [you]1712-you felt like going to [that new tapas place]1715-that new tapas place after work . [A bunch of [us]1714-we]1716-a bunch of us are going for happy hour . ”[94-lass]

[She]58-sue wong ’s being nice because [I]94-lass ’m so pitiful , which makes [me]94-lass feel even worse . “ It ’s sweet that [you]1712-you always include [me]94-lass , but . . . ”[94-lass] [I]94-lass gesture helplessly at the sheaf of papers [Portia]340-portia left on [my]94-lass desk .

“ Okay . Maybe next time . ”[58-sue wong] [Sue]58-sue wong departs with a shrug and a smile .

[I]94-lass spend the next few hours at [my]94-lass desk with [my]94-lass nose buried in pages . [I]94-lass keep at it long after [everyone else]343-everyone else has gone [home]321-home for the weekend , long after [any sane person]345-any sane person would ’ve packed it in .

Maybe [I]94-lass ate [my]94-lass sanity with the gallon of ice cream [I]94-lass had for dinner last night .

By the time [I]94-lass get back to [[my]94-lass apartment]346-my apartment , [I]94-lass ’ve got a headache that feels like [a serial killer]347-a serial killer is drilling a hole into the top of [my]94-lass head with a rusty drill bit soaked in hot sauce . [My]94-lass plan is to eat something , get a few hours of sleep , and get back into [the office]348-the office bright and early to work on the manuscript . Normally [I]94-lass can work on [my]94-lass projects from [home]321-home using the computer , but paper files are n’t allowed to leave [the building]349-the building for security reasons , so [I]94-lass ’m stuck going back to [my]94-lass desk .

Thank [you]350-you , [Portia]340-portia .

As soon as [I]94-lass step off [the elevator]351-the elevator , [I]94-lass hear the music . It ’s extremely loud and thumping with bass — some kind of rock . Or maybe rap . [I]94-lass ca n’t tell for sure . All [I]94-lass know is that the lyrics include a few words that would curl [[my]94-lass mother]340-portia ’s hair .

As [I]94-lass walk down [the hall]353-the hall , [I]94-lass ’m alarmed to discover the music is coming from [the apartment]348-the office directly across from [mine]94-lass . Judging by all the voices and raucous laughter , [[my]94-lass neighbor]354-my neighbor is n’t alone .

[Kellen]62-kellen never has parties .

Irritated , [I]94-lass pull up [my]94-lass coat sleeve and look at [my]94-lass watch . [I]94-lass debate whether or not [I]94-lass should knock on [his]354-my neighbor door , but [my]94-lass stomach is making some aggressive rumbling noises that manage to penetrate through the thundering bass , so [I]94-lass decide to eat first and deal with [Kellen]62-kellen on a full stomach .

In the event of a nuclear war , the first thing [I]94-lass ’d do is eat . [I]94-lass ca n’t handle life when [I]94-lass ’m hungry .

As soon as [I]94-lass unlock [my]94-lass door , [Mr. Bingley]370-michael attacks .

“ Rr - ow ! ”[370-michael] [He]370-michael stands on [his]370-michael hind legs and sinks [his]370-michael claws into [my]94-lass skirt .

FIVE

SEVEN

THIRTEEN

When Life ’s midcrisis has begun

And the bloom is off the rose ,

[We]819-we women of a certain age are glum ,

Ignored by [men]1754-men for [those

Young girls of perky breast and thigh

And coy , long - lashed flirtations]821-those young girls of perky breast and thigh and coy , long - lashed flirtations .

But such pleasures — such delights!—are nigh

For [men]1754-men desiring new sensations ,

For [[we]819-we mature ladies]822-we mature ladies ( still full of life )

Are seasoned by [our]819-we complications .

[We]819-we bring to love [a certain spice

Unknown to less experienced maidens]823-a certain spice unknown to less experienced maidens .

So look not , [[you]824-you men]825-you men , to the young for [their]825-you men easy charms ,

But satisfy [your]824-you deeper yearnings in [an older woman]826-an older woman ’s arms .

SIXTEEN

In green and gold and brown they ’re lit ,

Composed of dazzling color ,

With sparks and laughter and lively wit

[They]902-they move [me]94-lass like no other

Eyes in a face [I]94-lass ’ve ever seen .

So starkly seductive [they]902-they are ,

A gaze straight from a lovely dream

With a shine like a brilliant star .

And lashes long and curved and dark

As soot and devils ’ souls ,

All [my]94-lass resistance is a lark ,

These knees are weak as a newborn foal ’s .

[I]94-lass beg of [you]69-hullo , [my]94-lass burning Sun ,

With this poor heart [you]69-hullo ’ll soon be done .

TWENTY

TWENTY - FOUR

Nowhere girl

Such long - standing dysfunction

Heart unfurled

Pain like heavyweight punches

Chaos of wings

Inside [my]94-lass head

Bittersweet things

Sleep beside [me]94-lass in bed

Ten years , one hope , an impossible dream

And then [he]366-cam spoke , but how can it be

The words [he]366-cam said were n’t right but wrong

But perhaps after all the problem is [me]94-lass ?

[My]94-lass hunger has grown too impossibly huge

[I]94-lass ’m [a woman with no one and nothing to lose]1193-a woman with no one and nothing to lose .

It ’s Wednesday . [I]94-lass ’m at [my]94-lass desk at work , doing what [I]94-lass do best .

Obsessing .

[I]94-lass title the sonnet [I]94-lass ’ve just composed “ Hunger , ”[94-lass] save it to the computer ’s hard drive , and close out of the word processing program . Then [I]94-lass do the thing [I]94-lass ’ve been wrestling with [my]94-lass conscience about for the past several hours and google [Cameron McGregor]366-cam .

[I]94-lass ’m staggered when the search produces more than forty - five million results .

There ’s [his]366-cam Wikipedia page , [his]366-cam social media feeds , countless news articles , interviews , and photos . It ’s jarring seeing the photos of [him]366-cam in action on [the rugby field]1194-the rugby field because [he]366-cam looks nothing like the man [I]94-lass ’ve come to know .

[He]366-cam looks feral . Ferocious . Frightening . Like [he]366-cam ’s released from [a maximum security prison]1195-a maximum security prison on short - term leave only for [his]366-cam games . There is n’t a single photograph of [him]366-cam smiling .

Off [the field]1194-the rugby field , or pitch , as [I]94-lass learn it ’s called , the situation is even worse . [He]366-cam must be followed relentlessly by paparazzi when [he]366-cam ’s in [Europe]13-europe , because [his]366-cam every move has been documented on film . [He]366-cam scowls into the camera from all angles , whether staggering out of [a pub]1196-a pub or swaggering into [an expensive car]1197-an expensive car .

Then there are [the women]575-the women .

Born into poverty to [a teenage single mother in [Edinburgh]30-edinburgh]1206-his mother , [Scotland]15-scotland , [Cameron Christopher McGregor]366-cam faced grave odds from the start . TWENTY - NINE

The man in the girly pink robe and [I]94-lass

Sit on a bench in [the park]1395-the park discussing the weather .

[He]1394-the man in the girly pink robe speaks of stardust and miracles while [I]94-lass sigh ,

Wondering how it ’s so effortless to be together

With [someone]325-someone so different from [me]94-lass , yet the same ,

Over laughter and food [our]1397-our friendship is dawning .

Yet strip away the smiling outer shells — what remains ?

Two hearts in darkness , filled with unbearable longing .

Pink robes can mask pain as well as spare flesh

Can be used as somewhere to hide .

Each time [we]1397-our meet [I]94-lass ’m moved afresh

By [his]1394-the man in the girly pink robe eloquence , [his]1394-the man in the girly pink robe beauty , [his]1394-the man in the girly pink robe pride .

The man in the girly pink robe is like home

The safest and strongest and best that [I]94-lass ’ve known .

“ [I]94-lass must be getting [my]94-lass period , ”[94-lass] [I]94-lass mutter , angrily wiping the tears from [my]94-lass eyes . “ This is ridiculous . ”[94-lass]

[I]94-lass stand , place [my]94-lass sonnet book back into the top drawer of [my]94-lass desk in [[my]94-lass bedroom]399-my bedroom , and look out the window . It ’s snowing . Flakes float sideways past the pane , gathering in white drifts like dustings of sugar on the corners of the sill .

It ’s Saturday the twenty - third . The office holiday party starts in three hours .

[I]94-lass ’m officially freaking out .

[I]94-lass did n’t sleep at all last night . Or the night before . Or the night before that . Dinner with [Cam]366-cam a few days ago left [me]94-lass raw in ways [I]94-lass did n’t expect and did n’t feel right away . It was n’t until after [he]366-cam left that night that [I]94-lass got to thinking about what [he]366-cam ’d said about having gratitude for [my]94-lass body instead of treating it like a one - night stand .

For some reason that really resonated .

The first time [I]94-lass went on a diet , [I]94-lass was twelve . [I]94-lass had n’t even gotten [my]94-lass period yet . [[My]94-lass mother]340-portia , on the other hand , had recently turned forty and was inconsolable . [Her]340-portia grief at passing that milestone age was like a black shroud that hung over [the house]2096-the house . [Everyone]386-everyone spoke in muted tones and tiptoed around for almost a month as if [someone]325-someone had died .

[[My]94-lass sister]2062-my sister — beautiful even at nine — snickered .

That was all it took . [I]94-lass remember the moment clearly . It was the last time [I]94-lass put anything into [my]94-lass mouth without feeling guilt .

From then on , every billboard , every commercial , the pages of every glossy magazine declared to [me]94-lass in no uncertain terms that [I]94-lass did n’t look how [I]94-lass should . There were no images of [voluptuous women]1404-voluptuous women back then , hardly any of [women of color]1405-women of color . [Everyone]233-everyone was blonde , thin , perfect . Homogeneous . If [you]1406-you were [a European supermodel]1407-a european supermodel , then [you]1406-you were allowed to be [brunette]1408-brunette , but [you]1406-you could n’t look too “ ethnic , ”[1406-you] or forget it .

Making matters worse , [I]94-lass lived at [the beach]1409-the beach in [Southern California]34-southern california . [Blonde , thin , perfect women]1410-blonde , thin , perfect women are manufactured in that area of [the world]383-the world like widgets . If [you]1406-you did n’t have straight teeth , [you]1406-you got braces . If [you]1406-you were n’t slender , [you]1406-you starved [yourself]1406-you . If [you]1406-you were n’t tan , [you]1406-you laid in a machine shaped like a coffin that blasted cancer - causing UV rays at [your]1406-you skin until it complied and turned an acceptable shade of golden brown .

Or burned and freckled , like [mine]94-lass did .

[No one]1816-no one ever told [me]94-lass it was okay to be [me]94-lass . All [[my]94-lass friends]1413-my friends were on diets throughout [our]1414-our teenage years . [All of [us]1414-our]1415-all of us were drowning in self - loathing .

The ghost of [my]94-lass reflection gazes back at [me]94-lass from the window . [She]1416-she ’s pale , unsmiling , [her]1416-she hair a dark cloud around [her]1416-she head . [She]1416-she looks like [she]1416-she ’s seen things [she]1416-she wishes [she]1416-she had n’t .

THIRTY - ONE

When [Cam]366-cam opens to [my]94-lass knock , [I]94-lass throw [my]94-lass arms around [his]366-cam shoulders and bury [my]94-lass face in [his]366-cam neck .

“ [Joellen]126-joellen ! What happened ? Why ’re [you]126-joellen back already ? ”[366-cam]

Unable to speak without bursting into a fresh round of tears , [I]94-lass shake [my]94-lass head . [My]94-lass whole body trembles . [I]94-lass ’m so upset it ’s like a bomb went off inside [my]94-lass stomach and ripped a huge hole right through [me]94-lass .

Everything [I]94-lass ’ve been fantasizing about for the past ten years has been just that : a fantasy . THIRTY - FIVE

By the time [the taxi]1621-the taxi drops [me]94-lass off in front of [[my]94-lass apartment building]640-my apartment building , [I]94-lass ’ve nearly wet [myself]94-lass in panic .

The flight leaves in an hour . One hour . A span of sixty minutes to throw a suitcase together , get [Mr. Bingley]370-michael in [[his]370-michael carrier]1623-his carrier with all [his]370-michael stuff , and get to [the airport]2492-the plane before boarding ends and [no more passengers]1625-no more passengers are allowed on [the plane]2492-the plane . Which means [I]94-lass ’m going to be forced into one of those terrible , cliché romance movie endings where [the hero]1626-the hero finally realizes [his]1626-the hero love for [the heroine]667-the heroine and rushes to [the airport]2492-the plane in [a car]2581-a car with all [[his]1626-the hero friends]1413-my friends , fighting crawling traffic and [unnecessary street construction]1630-unnecessary street construction , until [he]1626-the hero arrives at the very last second before [the plane]2492-the plane takes off and declares [his]1626-the hero love , and all [the friends]1413-my friends cheer and get weepy , and then there ’s a nice montage of romantic reunions in [airports]1631-airports while the credits roll .

The elevator ride takes a thousand years . When it reaches [my]94-lass floor , [I]94-lass burst out of it and run smack into [Mrs. Dinwiddle]1817-mrs. dinwiddle . [We]1632-we collide with an audible “ Oof ! ”[1632-we] and go spinning in opposite directions . [She]1817-mrs. dinwiddle winds up leaning glamorously against the hallway wall , while [I]94-lass end up on [my]94-lass ass on the carpet .

[I]94-lass leap to [my]94-lass feet , shouting , “ Mrs. Dinwiddle [I]94-lass ’m so sorry [I]94-lass hope [you]94-lass ’re not hurt [I]94-lass have to go pack [I]94-lass ’m leaving right now for [Scotland]15-scotland [I]94-lass ’m not letting [Cam]366-cam get away ! ”[94-lass]

[I]94-lass turn around and tear down [the hallway]360-the hallway without waiting for a response . [I]94-lass sprint to [the bedroom]356-the closet , drag the one suitcase [I]94-lass own out of [the closet]356-the closet , toss it onto the bed , then start ripping clothes off [hangers]1636-hangers and hurling them into the suitcase with no regard for what [they]1636-hangers are or if anything matches .
